home.title: EWiki
home.subtitle: Make Documentation Writing Easy
home.pathPlaceholder: Paste absolute local project path, e.g., /home/me/myproj
home.dragDrop: Click to select ZIP file or drag file here
home.noProjects: No projects yet, go import one ~
home.deleteProjectConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete project
home.deleteWarning: This action will permanently delete the project and all its Wiki documentation, and cannot be recovered!

chat.supportedFormats: Supported formats: txt, md, pdf, doc, xls, json, xml, html, etc.
chat.analyzeStructure: Analyze project structure and module relationships
chat.provideAdvice: Provide development advice and best practices
chat.selectProjectLeft: Please select a project on the left
chat.inputPlaceholder: Enter questions about code, press Enter to send
chat.pressEnter: Press Enter to send, Ctrl+Enter for new line
chat.selectProjectToStart: Please select a project in the left sidebar to start conversation
chat.welcomeMessage:
Hello! I'm ready to analyze the code for project **{project}**.

You can ask me:
- The overall structure and functionality of this project
- Implementation details of specific modules or classes
- Code logic and business processes
- Technical architecture and design patterns

Please ask your first question!
chat.welcomeStructure: The overall structure and functionality of this project
chat.welcomeImplementation: Implementation details of specific modules or classes
